Get your brownies from Amanda Brownies, right here delivered to you by GrabFood. Enjoy!

id-en.body:
If you're thinking about brownies, it's got to be Amanda, a favourite with sweet-tooths across Indonesia. Who is Amanda? Amanda isn't actually a person, but an acronym for “Anak Menantu Damai”. This brownie boutique was founded by Ibu Sumi Wiludjeng in 1999; she initially sold bolu chocolate cakes door to door, delivered by bike. Slowly, the cakes evolved into the brownies we know and love today, the brand grew in popularity and Amanda Brownies became one of the precious food souvenirs people sought out when they made a trip to Bandung. Now, with Amanda Brownies available across the country, you can enjoy these famous treats delivered right to your door. 

With business growing, Amanda Brownies has expanded the menu to create various brownie innovations. Besides the top-selling Original Brownie, recent additions include Bali Banana, Lapis Kukus Blitar, Lapis Kukus Tugu Malang, Pia Kukus, and Pie Susu, all to satisfy a sweet tooth and cravings for local snacks. Now, there's no need to have a trip to Bandung for all these delicacies. Just sit back and simply order your favourites with a click through Grab's delivery app.

id-id.body:
Ingat brownies pasti ingat Amanda Brownies, sajian favorit para pecinta makanan manis di seluruh Indonesia. Siapa sih Amanda? Amanda ternyata bukan nama seseorang tapi kependekan dari “Anak Menantu Damai”. Butik brownies ini didirikan oleh Ibu Sumi Wiludjeng pada tahun 1999 yang awalnya berjualan bolu cokelat dari rumah ke rumah dengan menggunakan sepeda. Perlahan-lahan, kuenya berkembang menjadi brownies yang sekarang kita cintai ini. Saking terkenalnya, Amanda Brownies sering dijadikan oleh-oleh wajib bagi siapapun yang mampir di Bandung.

Dengan bisnisnya yang semakin berkembang, Amanda Brownies akhirnya memperluas menu mereka sampai mencakup berbagai inovasi brownies. Selain Original Brownies yang sudah populer selama ini, Amanda Brownies sekarang juga menawarkan rasa Bali Banana, Lapis Kukus Blitar, Lapis Kukus Tugu Malang, Pia Kukus, dan Pie Susu –terinspirasi dari citarasa legit kue tradisional favorit Indonesia.

Untungnya sekarang Amanda Brownies nggak hanya hadir di Bandung tapi juga bisa ditemukan di seluruh penjuru negeri%3A Jawa, Bali, Sumatera, Kalimantan, dan Sulawesi. Tinggal pesan delivery lewat GrabFood deh.

A&W is a fast food chain well known for its life changing root beer. Over time A&W's root beer evolved into the root beer float, where it combines the fresh sensation of root beer and the sweetness of ice cream.

For food, try out their fried chicken and warm chicken soup. When you don't fancy fried chicken, opt for their thick freshly baked waffle, served with a generous portion of ice cream. You choose the flavor, order it and GrabFood will deliver it to you.

Enjoy your meal!

Untuk makanannya, cobain ayam goreng, kentang goreng dan sup ayam A&W. Semuanya enak banget! Kalau lagi nggak kepingin makanan cepat saji, gimana kalau cobain Waffle A&W? Waffle tebal dan hangat ini disajikan dengan es krim pilihanmu - cokelat atau strawberry.

Pesen yuk, biar GrabFood yang anterin.

id-en.body:
A&W is an American chain of fast food restaurants famous for its root beer, root beer floats and burgers. The journey began in California in 1919 when Roy W. Allen sold his root beers at a parade honouring World War I veterans. Since then the humble stall has grown into a fast food chain giant, with outlets around the world. Today, A&W root beer, which is made with natural sugar cane, sarsaparilla root, licorice, birch bark and anise, is still served as fresh as ever in signature frosty mugs.

In Indonesia, A&W serves not only the classic menu of root beer floats and burgers, but also Indonesian favourites such as rice with fried chicken, and chicken soup. Many love the fried chicken for being not too oily, not too breaded, with just the right flavouring. There are two different types of fried chicken available%3A the not-spicy Golden Aroma Chicken and the Spicy Aroma Chicken with red peppers sprinkled on top.

Hungry yet? Order these American favourites from A&W from GrabFood for delivery straight to your door.

id-id.body:
A&W adalah gerai cepat saji Amerika Serikat yang terkenal dengan sajian burger dan root beer float (minuman root beer bermahkotakan es krim vanila). Perjalanan gerai ini berawal di Kalifornia pada tahun 1919 waktu pendirinya, Roy W. Allen, menjual root beer kreasinya di sebuah parade penghormatan bagi para veteran Perang Dunia I. Sejak itu, gerai sederhananya bertumbuh menjadi gerai cepat saji ternama yang tersebar di seluruh dunia. Root beer A&W terbuat dari gula alami, akar tanaman sarsaparila, akar manis, kulit kayu birch, serta anis, dan sampai sekarang masih terus memberi kesegaran unik yang sama dalam gelas khas root beer A&W.

Di Indonesia, A&W nggak hanya menyajikan menu klasik di atas tapi juga makanan favorit orang Indonesia, yaitu nasi dengan ayam goreng, serta sup ayam. Banyak yang jatuh hati dengan ayam gorengnya yang nggak terlalu berminyak dan nggak memakai tepung terlalu banyak. Ada dua pilihan ayam goreng%3A Golden Aroma Chicken yang nggak pedas, dan Spicy Aroma Chicken yang pedasnya didapat dari paprika merah. Pas ayamnya dimakan dengan nasi hangat, hmm… enak banget deh pokoknya.

Bikin lapar, kan? Buruan yuk pesan menu A&W favoritmu di delivery GrabFood sekarang.

Launched in 2013 with the name “Ayam Geprek Sambal Korek” in Cakung, East Jakarta, the owner decided to change the name into “Ayam Geprek Juara Sambal Korek”  or simply “Ayam Geprek Juara” in 2015. id-en.body:
Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus is renowned for selling hot and spicy smashed chicken, which is loved by all.

Owned by Ridho Nurul Adityawan, the name “Gembus” comes from his childhood name. After saving money working a variety of jobs, Ridho decided to finally make his dream come true by running his own business. He opened his first outlet in a tent in Pesanggrahan, West Jakarta back in October 2013. In less than a year, Ridho started to expand his business through a franchise system and now has almost 700 outlets across Indonesia and neighbouring countries. The growth and success has come solely from word of mouth; evidence that a tasty menu will create its own fan base.

The signature spicy smashed chicken with garlic and onion chili paste is made to order. Choose between fried, battered or grilled chicken. With outlets across the country, Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus can now be easily enjoyed through GrabFood delivery.

id-id.body:
Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus terkenal dengan ayam gepuk pedasnya yang digemari banyak orang. Menu populer para penggemarnya tentu saja si ayam gepuk original dengan Sambal Gembus yang spektakuler pedasnya. Ayamnya bisa dipilih antara ayam Original (ayam goreng biasa) atau ayam Gembus Krispi (ayam goreng tepung). Sambalnya sendiri adalah sambal bawang dengan rasa pedas mantap yang dibuat per pesanan.

Nama “Gembus” didapat dari nama kecil sang pemilik, Ridho Nurul Adityawan. Setelah mengumpulkan uang dari berbagai pekerjaannya, Ridho akhirnya memutuskan untuk membuka bisnisnya sendiri. Pada bulan Oktober 2013, tunailah impiannya waktu kedai ayam gepuk pertamanya di Pesanggrahan, Jakarta dibuka. Belum sampai setahun, gerai ayamnya sudah langsung melebarkan sayap bisnis melalui sistem waralaba hingga sekarang ayamnya tersedia di 700 outletnya yang tersebar di Indonesia hingga ke negara-negara tetangga.

Kunci suksesnya apa sih? Ternyata merek satu ini terkenal hanya melalui promosi mulut ke mulut para penggemarnya, lho. Inilah bukti bahwa Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus enaknya nggak main-main. id-en.body:
Founded in Malang, East Java in 2012, Ayam Goreng Nelongso opens round the clock to serve chicken in a variety of styles at an affordable price. Bestselling menu items range between Rp 12,000 to Rp 22,000, which already include rice, chicken, lalapan (fresh vegetables), and super spicy sambal. The popular Indonesian dishes of chicken and sambal are  affordably priced, making it easy for many to fall in love with Ayam Goreng Nelongso.

The word “Nelongso” stands for “modest” in Javanese. The company's mission is to serve affordable meals to many. Although tagged at a very friendly price, the taste is nowhere near modest! Many are addicted to its super spicy chili paste that comes in different styles%3A sambal matah, sambal bawang, sambal korek, sambal ijo, sambal Lamongan, sambal plecing, or sambal tomat. You can check  out the different sambals on the menu detailed on GrabFood.

Besides the sambal, signature seasonings of various Indonesian spices marinate the chicken perfectly , ensuring that everyone asks for more!. The crispiness of the skin is just right. Ayam Goreng Nelongso fries the chicken following a specific method earns it a place as the go-to menu for many in East Java, Jakarta, and Bandung.

Interested? Order now via GrabFood  for a delivery of  chicken goodness to come your way. Available in 14 cities in Java Island.

id-id.body:
Berdiri pertama kali di Malang pada tahun 2012, Ayam Goreng Nelongso buka sepanjang hari untuk menjajakan berbagai jenis ayamnya dengan harga bersahabat. Rentang harga menu favorit di sini hanya antara Rp12.000 sampai Rp22.000 saja, dan sudah termasuk nasi, ayam, lalapan, plus sambalnya yang super pedas. Lidah Indonesia yang cinta sambal dan ayam, serta harganya yang bersahabat inilah yang bikin banyak orang jatuh cinta sama Ayam Goreng Nelongso.

“Nelongso” dalam bahasa Jawa sendiri bisa diartikan sebagai “ala kadarnya”. Nama ini dipakai karena sang pendiri bermaksud menyediakan hidangan komplit dengan harga terjangkau yang bisa dinikmati semua kalangan. Walau namanya Ayam Goreng Nelongso, tapi rasanya jauh dari nelongso, lho. Bumbu ayamnya dibuat dari campuran rempah-rempah dan meresap hingga ke bagian dalam daging ayamnya. Kegaringan kulit ayamnya juga pas banget pas digigit. Sambalnya juga nagih, apalagi jenisnya ada banyak banget%3A sambal matah, sambal bawang, sambal korek, sambal ijo, sambal Lamongan, sambal plecing, dan sambal tomat. Nggak heran, begitu mulai makan Ayam Goreng Nelongso, jadi pada susah berhenti ngunyah!

Waktu pesan Ayam Goreng Nelongso untuk delivery via GrabFood, rincian jenis sambalnya bisa dilihat di masing-masing menunya. Jadi tinggal pilih menu mana yang sambalnya paling cocok di lidahmu. Hadir di 14 kota di pulau Jawa, ini waktunya buka GrabFood dan pesan Ayam Goreng Nelongso untuk diantar ke kenyamanan rumahmu!

id-en.body:
Originating from Solo, Central Java, Ayam Keprabon Express takes pride in its crunchy fried chicken and smashed chicken. The menu here has received such good feedback that  Ayam Keprabon and Ayam Keprabon Express are now available in many big cities throughout Indonesia.

The popular menu items are Ayam Geprek (smashed chicken) and Ayam Geprek Blenger (smashed chicken with melted mozzarella cheese). The chicken is smashed so it  resembles shredded  chicken meat, very easy to eat with just a spoon and fork. Choose whether you want the chicken with rice or mixed with noodles. For spice lovers the sambal is available from level 1 to 5 with even the lowest level containing four chillies. There are different sambals too. Sambal Bawang (onion and garlic chili paste), Sambal Karca (curry and rica style chili paste), and Sambal Matah (Balinese chili paste). So, when you order Ayam Keprabon Express for delivery, don't forget to mention the heat of your sambal level too!

For additional crunchiness, you can also order Nasi Krikil%3A white rice with crunchies, the winning factor for any kids (and adults, too!).

Respon terhadap menu mereka begitu baiknya sampai banyak yang mau Ayam Keprabon hadir di kota-kota selain Solo. Akhirnya pada tahun 2017, Ayam Keprabon mulai melebarkan sayapnya ke berbagai kota lainnya di pulau Jawa hingga ke Banjarmasin dan Makassar.

Menu yang banyak dipesan di sini adalah Ayam Geprek serta Ayam Geprek Blenger (ayam geprek yang diselimuti dengan lelehan keju mozzarella). Ayamnya digeprek sebegitu rupa hingga hampir mirip dengan ayam suwir, jadi makannya juga gampang, nggak harus pakai tangan. Tinggal dipilih mau ayamnya dimakan dengan nasi atau Indomie.

Waktu pesan, kamu juga bisa memilih jenis sambalmu, lho. Ada Sambal Bawang, Sambal Karca (Kari dan Rica-Rica), dan Sambal Matah yang bisa dipilih dari Level 1 sampai Level 5. Setiap level ini mewakili 4 cabe, lho, jadi perhitungkan ketahanan pedasmu, ya. Untuk menambah citarasa renyah, cobain deh Nasi Krikilnya. Nasi Krikil adalah nasi bertabur kremes gurih yang pasti bakal jadi favorit semua umur.

Ayam Penyet ; that favourite dish of squeezed fried chicken, is a popular dish among Indonesians and Ayam Penyet Jakarta is one of the top places to order a good ayam penyet. Meals here are pretty simple, mostly packaged into set meals. The most popular menu is Nasi Urap Ayam Penyet consisting of white rice, fried chicken with crispies, urap (mixed vegetables with seasoned grated coconut), stir-fried vegetables, chips, and sambal. The chicken is juicy, and the yellow seasoning that flavours the chicken meat is savoury (even better when eating this juicy meat with the crispies. Other than urap, you can also opt for your liking to replace the urap with pecel, capcay, or gado-gado. The gado-gado sauce in Ayam Penyet Jakarta is smooth, full of spice, and slightly spicy, awesome for anyone who loves their gado-gado!

Founded in 2011, Ayam Penyet matches taste with friendly pricing. For less than Rp 40,000 you can enjoy a wide array of options to fill you up. Despite having the name “Jakarta”, this brand is rather well known in Medan, all the way up in North Sumatra. So, if you're feeling in the mood for a good Ayam Penyet, GrabFood is ready to make a delivery, anytime.

id-id.body:
Ayam Penyet Jakarta adalah salah satu tempat ayam penyet terenak yang wajib kamu coba kalau lagi mencari ayam penyet. Menu makanannya tergolong ringkas dan nggak susah untuk dipilih disediakan dalam paketan. Yang paling populer adalah Nasi Urap Ayam Penyetnya yang sudah lengkap dengan nasi putih, ayam penyet, urap, sayur tumis, kerupuk, dan sambal. Daging ayamnya empuk dan bumbu gurih kuningnya meresap hingga ke bagian dalam dagingnya. Kalau kamu nggak suka urap, bisa juga pesan paket rujak, capcay, atau gado-gado yang akan mengganti urapnya dengan pilihanmu tersebut. Yang suka gado-gado, coba deh bagaimana saus gado-gadonya di sini. Tekstur sausnya halus, penuh rasa, dan agak pedas.

Didirikan pada tahun 2011, Ayam Penyet Jakarta memadukan kelezatan dengan harga bersahabat. Dengan hanya Rp40.000, kamu sudah bisa mendapat berbagai jenis sajian enak nan mengenyangkan. Selain ayam penyet, di sini juga tersedia ayam bakar dan beberapa jenis sayuran lainnya. Uniknya, walaupun bernama ‘Jakarta' tapi ternyata outlet satu ini juga terkenal di Medan, Sumatera Utara, lho.

Yuk, buka GrabFood dan pesan Ayam Penyet Jakarta untuk kirim delivery ke rumah.

id-en.body:
Established as Bakmi Gajah Mada in 1959 by husband and wife Tjhai Sioe and Loei Kwai Fong in Jakarta, it was not until 1971 before  a branch opened in Melawai, South Jakarta. The original dishes, Bakmi Ayam GM and Pangsit Goreng (fried wonton), are still loved by many even though the brand now offers a diverse menu of more than 50 dishes of noodles, rice, and more. Noodles are the signature dish firm favourites include Bakmi Daging Sapi Cah Cabai, Bakmi Cap Cay, and Yi Fu Mie (or Yi Fu Mie Ni for small tummies).

The Bakmi Spesial GM (GM's Special Noodle) combines a savoury soy sauce chicken on signature flat noodles, sprinkled with button mushrooms that pair nicely with legendary crispy fried wonton; a  taste that cannot be found anywhere else. If you have never tried Bakmi GM, this signature menu item should be your first thing to try. Order  a side of meatballs, wonton soup, or fried wonton (most recommended!).

Browse Bakmi GM's tasty menu on GrabFood and order for delivery now. Say goodbye to queueing at this busy noodle shops.

Walaupun sekarang menu mereka sudah jauh berkembang hingga ada lebih dari 50 hidangan bakmi, nasi, dan lainnya, tapi hidangan orisinilnya –Bakmi Spesial GM dan Pangsit Goreng– sampai sekarang masih terus dicari semua orang. Bertahun-tahun lamanya sempat hanya tersedia di Jakarta, sekarang penduduk luar Jakarta bisa bernafas lega karena Bakmi GM kini tersedia di beberapa kota besar di Indonesia. Bebek Goreng H. Slamet serves duck and other traditional Indonesian food.

The duck is cooked with care and served with sambal korek, one of Indonesian many chili sauces. Bebek Goreng H. Slamet's duck is crispy, with thick meat coated in rich flavors.

Try out their Bebek Goreng, delivered to you by GrabFood.

id.body:
Bebek Goreng H. Slamet adalah restoran bebek yang juga menjual berbagai makanan khas Indonesia. 

Untuk bebeknya sendiri, restoran ini menyajikan bebek goreng dengan daging yang tebal dan cita rasa yang lezat dengan sambal korek.



Cobain Bebek goreng Andalan dari Bebek Goreng H. Slamet hari ini yuk. GrabFood yang anterin.

id-en.body:
Without a doubt, Bebek Goreng Haji Slamet has become a legend. Haji Slamet Raharjo was known among his neighbours in Solo to be a humble, simple man. In photos, he looked nothing like a man who had opened 34 outlets across Indonesia, serving mouthwatering fried duck for more than two decades.

H. Slamet opened his first fried duck warung with his wife Baryatin in 1986. Their stall was located on a side road between Solo and Yogyakarta, with an investment of only Rp 10,000. It was hard work at first, but H. Slamet's menu of fried duck, sambal korek, and rice finally became well known. What makes the duck extra special is the use of bebek afkir. Bebek Afkir has denser meat and thicker bones, which means they have to be cooked for longer. Hence, the spices are absorbed deeper into the meat. Before being cooked, H. Slamet also boiled the duck with water and herbs to make it more aromatic, then fried the duck until crispy. This is now the restaurant's signature dish. 

Now with 34 outlets across the archipelago, you can enjoy this legendary duck anywhere. Simply order on GrabFood and get it delivered.

id-id.body:
Haji Slamet Raharjo terkenal di antara tetangganya di Solo sebagai orang yang rendah hati dan sederhana. Benar-benar nggak akan ada yang menyangka kalau beliau adalah pemilik merek legendaris Bebek Goreng Haji Slamet yang memiliki 34 outlet di seluruh Indonesia.

H. Slamet membuka gerai bebek gorengnya bersama dengan istrinya, Baryatin, pada tahun 1986. Gerai pertama mereka terletak di jalan antara Solo-Yogyakarta, dan dibuka hanya dengan investasi Rp10.000 saja. Awalnya memang penuh dengan kerja keras tapi nggak lama kemudian menu H. Slamet seperti bebek goreng, sambal korek, dan nasinya langsung menjadi favorit.

Bebeknya istimewa karena memakai bebek afkir yang dagingnya lebih padat dan tulangnya lebih tebal. Karakteristik bebek afkir ini mengharuskan proses masak yang lebih lama sehingga bumbu rempah-rempah kreasi H. Slamet terserap hingga ke bagian dalam dagingnya. Sebelum dimasak, H. Slamet memasak bebeknya dalam air dan daun herbal untuk membuatnya lebih harum. Setelahnya, baru deh bebeknya digoreng sampai renyah.

Kalau mau coba bebek goreng enak, Bebek Goreng H. Slamet sudah pasti pilihan amannya. Langsung saja pesan delivery lewat GrabFood.

Have you heard about Bebek Kaleyo? This restaurant specialises in bebek goreng, bebek rica, dan bebek cabai hijau and has been cooking since January 15th, 2007. 

Even though their heart is with the ducks, Bebek Kaleyo understands you who may prefer chicken. They serve an array of chicken based items, siomay, and, to stay healthy, vegetables, too.

Take a look at their menu; all look really delicious. Why not order Bebek Kaleyo for your meal today? GrabFood will happily deliver it to you.

Siapa yang nggak kenal Bebek Kaleyo? Restoran dengan menu andalan bebek goreng, bebek rica dan bebek cabai hijau ini sudah mulai menyajikan bebek sejak 15 Januari 2007.

Meskipun spesialis bebek, Bebek Kaleyo paham betul kamu-kamu mungkin ada yang lebih suka makan ayam. Maka, mereka juga menyajikan ayam, siomay dan supaya sehat, tentunya berbagai jenis sayuran.

Lihat menunya deh. Enak-enak loh! Pesen buat makan hari ini, yuk. GrabFood yang anterin.

id-en.body:
Who doesn't love duck? Slightly richer than chicken with its own distinctive fragrant aroma, duck is often considered more upscale—a special occasion choice. But the four owners of Bebek Kaleyo want everyone to enjoy this special delicacy as a regular dish.

Without a strong culinary background, Hendri Prabowo, Fenty Puspitasari, Paulus Maria, and Riri Cahyanti collected nearly 300 pages of recipes about how to prepare and cook chicken as their inspiration to spice up their duck menu. Why take inspiration from chicken? Because recipes for duck is much less common! Testing their recipes on family and friends, they opened the business in 2007 and now have 17 outlets all over Java.

Neither a trend nor a seasonal item, for anyone wanting something more special for dinner without breaking the budget, Bebek Kaleyo is the answer. Accompanied by various options of sambal to order, enjoying a plate from Bebek Kaleyo will always be a memorable experience.

Order hot items, such as fried duck, grilled duck, or duck with green sambal, and get them delivered to your home for an extra enjoyable experience.

id-id.body:
Siapa sih yang nggak suka bebek? Memiliki cita rasa yang lebih kompleks dari ayam dengan aroma yang harum, bebek memang pilihan premium serta sajian yang sesuai untuk acara spesial. Tergolong hidangan premium, para pemilik Bebek Kaleyo memiliki pemikiran yang berbeda, yakni, supaya semua orang bisa menikmati bebek tanpa harus merogoh kocek terlalu dalam.

Meskipun nggak ada latar belakang kuliner tapi para pemiliknya yakin dengan visi mereka tersebut. Hampir 300 halaman resep tentang cara menyiapkan dan memasak ayam dikumpulkan untuk memberi inspirasi menu Bebek Kaleyo. Kok pakai resep daging ayam? Memang, karena resep untuk daging bebek jarang tersedia sehingga mereka harus bereksperimen dengan resep untuk ayam yang masih keluarga dekat bebek. Setelah melewati proses tes cicip-mencicip yang dilakukan para keluarga dan kerabat, Bebek Kaleyo akhirnya pede untuk membuka outlet pertamanya pada tahun 2007. Kini, merek satu ini sudah punya 17 gerai yang tersebar di seluruh pulau Jawa.

Yang mau hidangan spesial tapi ramah di kantong, wajib banget untuk mencoba Bebek Kaleyo. Pesan saja menu favorit mereka –bebek goreng, bebek panggang, dan bebek sambal ijo– lalu pilih delivery ke rumahmu untuk pengalaman yang ekstra. Disajikan dengan ragam pilihan sambal, hidangan Bebek Kaleyo pasti akan memberikan pengalaman yang nggak akan terlupakan.

When BreadTalk opened its first store in Indonesia in 2003, people were astonished by its see-through kitchen, self-serve concept, and glorious menu of pastries and breads laid bare in front of you. Showing the bakers at work in the kitchen speaks of freshness, while customers are invited to inspect and choose the breads themselves. All signs of a premium-quality bakery. 

BreadTalk is a franchise that highlights craftsmanship, innovation and the use of natural ingredients. Its C's Floss bread is an unusual combo of bread and chicken floss, but has won many hearts. In Indonesia, BreadTalk sold up to 20,000 C's Floss and Fire Floss (a spicy version) a day when they were first released. With 20 years of history, BreadTalk now boasts a portfolio of more than 100 innovative products, many of which can be ordered for delivery via GrabFood.

Beyond breads, the menu ranges from soft bolu to birthday cakes. Try some of the best sellers%3A muffin cheese, D'diva, Meat the Cheese, chantilly cakes, and tiramisu.

Now, you can find BreadTalk in around 140 outlets in Indonesia. With a delivery app in hand, whenever you need BreadTalk to start your day, it's only a click away!

id-en.body:
stablished in Florida in 1953, Burger King is one of the best known fast food chains in the world.

Burger King offers a classic menu of burgers in a comfortable, family-friendly setting. Along with using premium ingredients, the company provides nutritional information for each item on the menu so that diners can make “educated choices in customising their meals” before ordering.

Its signature burger (and you might know it well) is the Whopper%3A a quarter-pound flame-grilled beef patty, served with the perfect combo of fresh lettuce, tomatoes, crunchy pickles, mayo and ketchup. Since its introduction in 1957, its popularity just keeps growing — you can order a Whopper just how you like it. Want extra cheese or no onion? You got it. Fun fact%3A Burger King claims there are 221,184 possible ways for a guest to order an original Whopper!

Of course, there's a lot more to love on the menu, from the crispy fried chicken burgers to the fish filet and mushroom options, or burgers loaded with beef or chicken rashers to make the classic Burger King menu friendly for all local fans. 

Got a burger craving yet? Order a Whopper or your other faves any time for delivery via GrabFood!

id-id.body:
Didirikan di Florida pada tahun 1953, Burger King adalah restoran cepat saji ternama di dunia yang menawarkan menu klasik burger yang disajikan di tempat nyaman. Nggak hanya memakai bahan-bahan premium, Burger King juga memperlihatkan informasi gizi di setiap menu mereka supaya pelanggan bisa mempertimbangkan keperluan nutrisi mereka sebelum memesan.

Burger favorit di sini adalah Whopper, daging sapi 113 gram yang dipanggang dengan api besar dan dikombinasikan sempurna dengan selada segar, tomat, acar, mayones, dan kecap. Sejak kemunculan Whopper pada tahun 1957, popularitasnya terus menanjak pesat. Sekarang kamu bahkan bisa mengutak-atik Whopper sesuai kemauanmu, misalnya kamu mau kejunya ditambah atau nggak mau pakai bawang. Tinggal sebut saja di catatanmu waktu pesan delivery lewat GrabFood.

Selain Whopper, ada banyak menu lainnya yang wajib dicoba seperti burger dengan ayam goreng renyah Classic Crispy Chicken, burger fillet ikan (Fish Fillet Burger), hingga burger jejamuran Mushroom Swiss yang digemari para penggemar jamur. Apapun jenis daging pilihanmu, Burger King pasti ada menu burger enaknya.

id-en.body:
Who would have guessed that a bubble milk tea business would evolve into a global empire? This traditional drink from Taiwan is now globetrotting, and Indonesia is a big fan! With its huge menu of traditional teas and colourful toppings, Chatime has changed the way we consume tea.

Established in 2005 in Taiwan by Henry Wang Yao-Hui, Chatime's most popular drink quickly became apparent%3A pearl milk tea. Chatime opened its first branch in Indonesia in 2011%3A served to-go with its thick straw and black pearls sunk to the bottom, to Indonesians, pearl milk tea was such an unusual drink and people were instantly curious. Less than 10 years later, there are over 270 kiosks sprawling across 39 cities in Indonesia. (In other words, any time you want to order a delivery of your favourite tea, Chatime is just a click away!)

Feronia Wibowo, Director of Chatime Indonesia, believes in this milk tea business because Indonesians are tea lovers. With a menu adapted for the local palate and trends, Indonesians can enjoy a seasonal menu that includes flavours such as Chatime Cendol or the Brown Sugar series. Not a tea lover? Try one of the popular smoothies, from mango flavour to coconut.

Chatime's mission is to ‘promote Taiwan's typical milk tea all over the world as the best tea'. With more than 2500 outlets in 38 countries, we say%3A mission accomplished!

id-id.body:
Sepuluh, dua puluh tahun lalu, nggak akan ada yang menyangka kalau bisnis bubble milk tea bisa mendunia. Tapi toh nyatanya minuman tradisional asal Taiwan ini sudah ‘berkeliling dunia' sampai akhirnya muncul di Indonesia tahun 2011 lewat Chatime. Dengan menu teh tradisionalnya yang bervariasi plus topping warna-warni, Chatime membawa kita ke sejarah dan citarasa teh asli.

Didirikan pada tahun 2005 di Taiwan oleh Henry Wang Yao-Hui, menu Chatime yang langsung jadi primadona adalah Pearl Milk Tea. Disajikan dengan sedotan besar dan biji tapioka hitam (boba) yang mengendap di dasar gelas, minuman ini memang terlihat unik. Masyarakat Indonesia pun langsung terpikat.

Selalu giat mengadaptasi menunya sesuai tren dan citarasa lokal, kita juga bisa menikmati berbagai menu musimannya, seperti Chatime Cendol atau seri Brown Sugar-nya. Bukan pecinta teh? Cobain aja smoothies-nya yang hadir dengan berbagai varian rasa. Ada dari mangga sampai kelapa, semuanya buah-buahan khas Indonesia.

Dengan inovasi menu yang cocok dengan orang Indonesia, nggak heran Chatime langsung tersebar ke 39 kota Indonesia dengan jumlah 270 gerai dalam waktu kurang dari 10 tahun. Ini berarti besar kemungkinan Chatime ada di kotamu.

Kalau kamu butuh kesegaran untuk menyejukkan hari yang panas atau menemani penatnya waktu kerja dan belajarmu, langsung buka delivery GrabFood saja. Pilih kesegaran favoritmu dari Chatime sekarang juga.

In Indonesia, FamilyMart is considerably new, but is one of the fastest-growing convenience stores in the nation. Acknowledging the power of small to medium businesses in the country, FamilyMart is also one of the few convenience store chains that allows home-based businesses to sell their products, as long as it meets FamilyMart's standards.

FamilyMart has recently introduced three innovative digital features%3A an ordering kiosk, an app, and a self-service cashier, taking comfort and convenience to the next level!

id-en.body:
One of the pioneers of ayam geprek, Geprek Bensu has been serving its affordable, delicious version of this dish since 2017. Owned by Indonesian actor Ruben Onsu, this brand is now available in more than 130 outlets throughout Indonesia. Its menu is all about ayam geprek%3A smashed fried chicken mixed with sambals of different varieties and levels of spiciness. The four favourite items to order are Geprek Bensu Original; Geprek Bensu Sambal Embe (a sambal from Bali); Geprek Bensu Leleh served with a mixed sauce of mozzarella cheese and egg; and Geprek Bensu Telur Asin (salted egg). Each of these are renowned for their distinct flavours.

Geprek Bensu is unique in the way that it showcases the diverse flavours of Indonesia. For a Javanese taste, there's the Paket Nasi Daun Jeruk and Paket Sambal Kecombrang. From Sumatra, Geprek Bensu introduces Geprek Bensu Sambal Teri and Geprek Bensu Nasi Rendang. Flavours from other islands appear in Geprek Bensu Sambal Matah, Geprek Bensu Dabu-dabu, and Geprek Bensu Sambal Roa.

If you're currently craving fried chicken that is unmistakably Indonesian, check Geprek Bensu's menu on GrabFood and order a delivery straight to your place!

Just when we thought the bubble milk tea trend was getting dull, Gulu Gulu brought the latest Asian tea drink to the market%3A cheese tea. All over Asia, cheese tea is popping up on menus. People will wait in line or get it delivered just to get their hands on this latest trend. And Gulu Gulu is proud to be “the first to introduce the cheese tea craze in Indonesia.”

Established in 2017 by the Sour Sally Group, Gulu Gulu is on a mission to deliver the best cheese tea to Indonesians. Founder Donny Pramono Ie, with his Taiwanese-Singaporean partner Shaun Markus Lee, visited the highlands of Taiwan to search for the perfect tea leaves that will make the ideal base for the rich cheesy foam. Using primarily black tea, green tea, or jasmine tea, Gulu Gulu has created an interesting menu. Try one of  these favorites%3A Cheese Umami Matcha, Cheese Taiwanese Royal Milk Tea, or Cheese Black Sakura Tea.

Even without the cheese foam, Gulu Gulu's tea still tastes special. Order the Hokkaido Melon tea, or if you're a coffee lover, try the Taiwanese Sweet Corn Coffee.

Gulu Gulu's founders are keen to bring the distinctive Taiwanese concept of cheese tea to the Indonesian market. With around 30 outlets across the island, it's clear that Gulu Gulu has successfully made Indonesians fall in love with this new trend.

Banyak yang rela mengantri panjang atau menunggu delivery hanya untuk mencicipi tren baru ini. Gulu Gulu sendiri dengan bangga menyatakan bahwa mereka adalah yang pertama memperkenalkan Demam Cheese Tea di Indonesia. 

Didirikan pada tahun 2017 oleh Sour Sally Group, Gulu Gulu komit mau membuat Cheese Tea terbaik di Indonesia. Karena itulah, pemilik Gulu Gulu Cheese Tea --Donny Pramono Ie dan rekannya Shaun Markus Lee-- secara khusus mengunjungi perbukitan Taiwan untuk mencari daun teh yang paling pas untuk dipadu dengan busa keju yang kental. Dan jadilah cheese tea kebanggaan Gulu Gulu yang digemari banyak orang.

Menggunakan teh hitam, teh hijau, dan teh melati, menu Gulu Gulu memang menarik. Coba deh menu-menu favorit mereka seperti Cheese Umami Matcha, Cheese Taiwanese Royal Milk Tea, dan Cheese Black Sakura Tea. Launched in 2018 in Binus University, its owners weren't expecting an overflow of orders. On the first day, HAUS! served 150 cups and sales have continued to surge. With the majority of customers being students, the formula became obvious%3A affordable price (cheaper than most competitors) and a menu that's trending.

Selling not only boba drinks or es kopi susu, its menu offers a wide array of hit drinks, split into several series%3A Classic Series, Cheese Series, Yakult Series, Hot Series, Choco Series, Coffee Series, and Boba Series. Basically, whatever is trending, HAUS! will have it. With drink trends changing so rapidly, the HAUS! strategy is to accommodate everyone's preference. With a vision to be recognised as a nationally known brand, with over 70 outlets across the country, surely this strategy will hit the sweet spot.

HAUS! now offers more than 30 items — and all can be delivered to you via GrabFood. With prices as low as Rp 7.000, who can resist a drink?

id.body: Lagi ngidam makanan Jepang? HokBen siap membawamu lidahmu ke Jepang dengan mencicipi Beef Teriyaki, Beef Yakiniku, Chicken Katsu, Ebi Furai sampai salad dan sup sukiyaki. id-en.body:
Established in 1985 in Kebon Kacang, Jakarta, founder Hendra Arifin wanted to offer a range of Japanese bento dishes practical for takeaway or delivery orders. Its buffet-style menu, which allows customers to choose their dishes, quickly became iconic in the local food scene. 

Hoka Hoka Bento, as the restaurant chain was first known, means “steaming hot food in a box”. Fun fact%3A In 2013, the restaurant officially rebranded as HokBen, the endearing nickname customers had been using! The menu consists of home-style dishes such as chicken katsu, chicken or beef teriyaki, chicken or beef yakiniku and karaage. You can also order from the a la carte menu, which offers HokBen's original chicken steak; for those who love food deliveries, the bento specials might be an easy choice. Though the menu is Japanese-inspired, HokBen has adapted its offering for local tastes%3A its sweet and extra spicy sambal is the perfect condiment for warm rice and chicken katsu. A local classic!

Even though there's nothing else quite like HokBen in Indonesia, the restaurant is more than a Japanese fast food chain. With its mission to give back to the community, HokBen has launched various CSR programmes, such as blood donation drives, donations for the elderly, and scholarships for children in need. Its restaurants are also family focused, which is perhaps the reason why HokBen is such a go-to for people of all ages.

id-id.body:
Berdiri pertama kali pada tahun 1985 di Kebon Kacang, Jakarta, pendiri HokBen Hendra Arifin bermaksud menawarkan konsep bento praktis. Gaya penyajian makanan secara buffet yang membebaskan pengunjung untuk menunjuk hidangan apa saja yang mereka mau akhirnya menjadi ciri khas HokBen. Asal nama HokBen adalah Hoka Hoka Bento, yang berarti “makanan hangat dalam sebuah kotak.” Dan memang demikianlah sajian hidangan HokBen, apalagi kalau hidangannya disiapkan di dalam kotak waktu pesan untuk takeaway atau delivery.

Menu HokBen terdiri dari masakan rumahan a la Jepang, seperti ayam katsu, daging teriyaki, daging yakiniku, dan karaage yang memiliki penggemarnya masing-masing. Popularitas HokBen sendiri didapat dari menu inspirasi Jepang dengan rasa yang sudah disesuaikan dengan lidah lokal. Contohnya, HokBen menyediakan sambal pedas nan manis yang pas banget untuk dimakan dengan nasi hangat dan ayam katsu-nya. 

Selain menyediakan makanan yang lekat di lidah orang Indonesia, HokBen juga memiliki misi untuk berkontribusi kepada masyarakat Indonesia melalui acara sumbang darah, donasi bagi para lansia, dan beasiswa bagi mereka yang membutuhkan. Nggak heran kan kalau restoran ini dicintai oleh seluruh masyarakat Indonesia.

Picking a menu favourite at Holland Bakery is hard because everyone has his/her own favourites. id-en.body:
Owner and actor Ruben Onsu founded I Am Geprek Bensu in 2017 for a simple reason%3A he wanted to help chicken farmers in Indonesia by buying their chickens. Pairing together two of Indonesia's favourites%3A Chicken and sambal he opened “I Am Geprek” which is a wordplay on “ayam geprek” (smashed chicken). The use “I am” instead of “ayam” was considered for its flexibility in case he ever diversifies from chicken!

The popular menu items here are, not surprisingly, the smashed chicken. Choose from the original smashed chicken meal set, cheesy smashed chicken, or melted cheese smashed chicken. Other than the original sambal bawang, the outlet also offers green chilli, sambal teri, and sambal matah. If you want to order for a delivery, don't forget to mention the heat level of sambal you want, from level 1 to level 10.

Now available in more than 100 outlets in 24 cities all over Indonesia, you can enjoy these delicacies  with GrabFood now. Make your smashed chicken meal even better with smashed sides of mushroom, eggplant, tempe, or tofu. The crispy chicken skin is a winner too!

id-id.body:
Aktor Ruben Onsu mendirikan I Am Geprek Bensu pada tahun 2017 dengan tujuan sederhana%3A membantu para peternak ayam di Indonesia dengan membeli ayamnya. Setelah memikirkan ide terbaik untuk memanfaatkan pembeliannya, ia akhirnya memutuskan bahwa ayam dan sambal adalah duo tak terkalahkan di Indonesia. Akhirnya didirikanlah “I Am Geprek”, sebuah pelesetan dari kata “ayam geprek” yang menjadi hidangan utamanya saat ini. Ruben memakai kata “I Am” dan bukannya “Ayam” karena dia mau berjaga-jaga supaya mereknya bisa tetap dipakai kalau-kalau suatu hari nanti dia memutuskan menjual makanan selain ayam ke depannya.

Menu ayam gepreknya ada berbagai macam%3A ayam geprek biasa, ayam geprek keju, dan ayam geprek keju leleh. Bedanya geprek keju dan keju leleh adalah jenis kejunya. Ayam geprek keju memakai keju parut sedangkan keju leleh memakai keju mozzarella. Untuk sambalnya, I Am Geprek punya sambal bawang yang menjadi sambal utamanya serta sambal hijau, sambal teri, dan sambal matah. Tingkat kepedasannya sendiri tersedia dari Level 1 sampai Level 10. Mau menambah kenikmatan hidanganmu? Pesan saja ragam geprek tambahan seperti jamur, terong, tahu, tempe, bakso, dan masih banyak lagi.

Dengan kehadirannya di 24 kota di Indonesia, I Am Geprek Bensu mudah ditemukan di mana saja. Tinggal GrabFood, datang deh delivery geprekannya.

J.CO Donuts & Coffee's mission is simple%3A to serve you soft and fluffy donuts with premium toppings, then pair it with the best companion — coffee. This classic combo is what J.CO is all about. Its donut menu is extensive and it's no wonder that the 12-pack is the most ordered item! Get it delivered for an event as a sure-fire way to please guests.

Established in Jakarta in 2005 by Johnny Andrean, J.CO's commitment to give you the perfect donut is clear. With a recipe developed to achieve balance and texture, premium toppings take J.CO's donuts to the next level. Think crisp Aussie almonds, smooth cream cheese from New Zealand and Japanese matcha. Not only delicious, the donut names are equally enjoyable%3A think Alcapone, Avocado Dicaprio and Berry Spears, just to name a few.

While it's hard to choose, make sure you order the best-selling Alcapone, which is dipped in white chocolate and topped with sliced toasted almonds. Enjoy it on the spot or simply avoid the queue and get it delivered to you! Beyond donuts and coffee, J.CO was also one of the first in Indonesia to introduce self-serve fro-yo to its menu.

Now, J.CO is branching out beyond Indonesia. With outlets in Malaysia, Hong Kong, Philippines, Singapore and Saudi Arabia, J.CO is set to rival other donuts and coffee giants in the world.

id-en.body:
Kedai Kopi Kulo  promises a menu like no other. And Clement Mathias, founder of Kedai Kopi Kulo, knows that his creativity in crafting the menu will make the brand go wild.  

Some of the most popular menu items are Avocatto (avocado juice, one shot of espresso and ice cream, a drink that is also a nod to popular street-fare drinks), Es Kopi Kulo Krim Keju (iced coffee with a thick froth of sweet cream cheese), and Coffeenade (tonic water, lemon, and an espresso shot). Going against the popularity wave of es kopi susu gula aren — the beloved brown sugar iced coffee, Kedai Kopi Kulo proves that coffee is a versatile ingredient and browsing a coffee shop menu can be fun!

‘Kulo' means ‘me' in the traditional Javanese language, so Kopi Kulo means ‘My Coffee', which reflects its philosophy to cater to various personas and moods. It's no wonder that Kedai Kopi Kulo is quickly becoming the new beloved coffee brand. Now available in Java, Sumatera, Bali, and Kalimantan, you can order Kedai Kopi Kulo via GrabFood for delivery any time of the day.

id-id.body:
Clement Mathias, pemilik Kedai Kopi Kulo, paham betul bahwa kreativitas dalam meracik menu unik akan membuat mereknya lebih mudah dikenali. Karena itulah, menu di Kedai Kopi Kulo sangatlah tidak biasa.

Salah satu produknya yang populer, Avocatto, merupakan campuran dari jus alpukat, satu shot espresso, dan es krim. Produk ini adalah modifikasi dari minuman klasik Indonesia, yaitu jus alpukat yang biasanya dibarengi dengan susu cokelat kental manis. Selain itu, ada juga si unik Es Kopi Kulo Krim Keju (es kopi dengan krim keju) serta Coffeenade (campuran air tonik, lemon, dan shot espresso). Walau nggak ngikutin tren es kopi susu gula aren, Kedai Kopi Kulo toh ternyata sukses dengan racikan kreatif minuman-minuman kopinya.

‘Kulo' sendiri artinya adalah ‘saya' dalam bahasa Jawa halus, sehingga Kopi Kulo artinya adalah ‘Kopi Saya' yang mencerminkan filosofinya untuk menjadi kedai kopi tujuan bagi siapapun. Nggak heran Kedai Kopi Kulo terus bertumbuh hingga sekarang hadir di Jawa, Sumatera, Bali, dan Kalimantan. Dicintai semua usia dan kalangan, Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC) sudah melayani dunia selama lebih dari 70 tahun dengan ayam bumbu originalnya yang nggak terlupakan. Rahasia kenikmatan ayam KFC terdapat pada proses pembuatannya. Dengan resep rahasia yang menggabungkan 11 jenis bumbu dan rempah, ayam original KFC selalu dimasak secara fresh dan disiapkan bukan dengan mesin tapi dengan tangan penuh dedikasi. Semuanya ini dilakukan demi citarasa ayam originalnya yang nggak ada duanya.

Tentu saja menu terbaik KFC adalah ayam originalnya, yang juga sering disebut dengan Ayam O.R. Tapi KFC juga punya ayam krispi yang populer di Indonesia, lho. Ayam krispi KFC rasanya pedas di daging dan renyah di kulitnya. Jadi, kalau kamu mau pesan ayam dari KFC, jangan lupa bilang ayamnya mau yang Original atau Krispi, ya.

Selain itu, KFC juga menjual banyak menu non-ayam lainnya yang sama enaknya. Kalau lagi ingin burger, pesan saja O.R. Burger yang berisikan daging ayam original KFC. Kalau lagi ingin yang sehat-sehat, cobain saja Twisty, semacam kebab berisikan salad dan potongan ayam krispi KFC. Yang pasti, KFC selalu punya sesuatu yang enak untuk disantap oleh siapa pun, di acara apa pun.

Jadi laper? Delivery aja, yuk, lewat GrabFood dan nikmati kelezatan KFC sekarang juga!

id-en.body:
Indonesians love their spices. So, it's no wonder that when a group of Indonesians regularly gather, there will be a light-bulb moment that has something to do with chillies, and a lot of them!

Aris Ardiansyah, owner of Kober Mie Setan, always refers to his community called Komunitas Bermain whenever the origin of his business comes up. Where there is a gathering, there's food and lots of sambal, usually delivered from a small eatery or warung nearby. This combination rarely fails to please, and is perhaps the reason why his business set the spicy “devil noodle” trend on fire in Indonesia.

Kober Mie Setan first opened in 2010 in Malang, and according to Aris Ardiansyah, it was the first to highlight extra spicy noodles in its menu. A plate of mie setan or “devil noodle”, the signature dish, consists of noodles, chillies, fried dumplings, sausage, veggies and chicken. A hot meal isn't complete with something plain and crunchy on the side, so make sure you order the fried prawn balls — also a best seller — to take down the heat, or choose something mild from their nice selection of dim sum.

What set Mie Kober apart from other noodle houses when it launched was its spice level. Almost no one thought about catering to Indonesians' personal craving and preference for spices. You can order 10 chillies or 60 and the Kober Mie Setan team will gladly whip up a plate for you. Even better? Get it delivered to you!

Warga Indonesia memang demennya yang pedas-pedas. Nggak heran kalau ada yang lagi ngumpul-ngumpul, ide percabean akhirnya tercetus.

Adalah Aris Ardiansyah, pemilik Kober Mie Setan, yang mendapatkan nama Kober dari Komunitas Bermain, komunitasnya sendiri. Dari komunitas inilah Aris menelurkan ide berjualan mie pedas. Kreasi mienya diperoleh dari modifikasi mie khas Malang yang kemudian diberi nama Kober Mie Setan.

Kober Mie Setan membuka gerai pertamanya di Malang pada tahun 2010. Menurut Aris, tempat makannya adalah yang pertama mengedepankan menu mie serba pedas. Semangkuk menu andalan mereka, Mie Setan, terdiri dari mie, cabe, pangsit goreng, sosis, sayuran, dan ayam. Untuk meredakan rasa pedas di leher, Kober Mie Setan juga menjual camilan udang renyah  dan dimsum. Dijamin kenikmatan mie-mu bakal makin maksimal.

Yang membedakan Kober Mie Setan dengan tempat mie lainnya adalah level pedas mereka yang disesuaikan dengan kemauanmu. Di sini, kamu bisa memesan mie dengan 10 atau 60 cabe. Menarik, kan? Kalau mau lebih asyik lagi, pedas-pedasan aja bareng teman-teman di rumah atau kos dengan pesan delivery via GrabFood!

Janji Jiwa began life as a small coffee kiosk at ITC Kuningan, Jakarta in 2018 and today sells five million cups a month from more than 400 kiosks nationwide. What's the secret to its quick success? It's a commitment to farmers, partners, and its people.

Janji Jiwa serves only fresh-to-cup products, sourcing coffee directly from farmers in Sumatera, which is then processed and roasted directly by Janji Jiwa. As the brand grows, the farmers benefit, too. Now, the company orders 30 tonnes of green beans every month from farmers.

Their partners reap the benefits, too. Nearly 90%25 of Janji Jiwa stores are owned by partners, and this number is rapidly growing as Janji Jiwa looks at having 700 kiosks in the near future, as consumers enjoy the convenience of ordering from delivery apps such as GrabFood. 

Janji Jiwa's menu is simple and delicious%3A iced coffee or tea with classic flavours such as green tea or chocolate. Look out for creative collaborations too, such as the recent tie-up with the famous barista Muhammad Aga. Make sure to order the Es Kopi Susu and Es Susu Coklat, two of the most popular items on the menu that are made with the farmers, partners, and people in mind.

Janji Jiwa memulai perjalanan kedai kopinya di ITC Kuningan, Jakarta, pada tahun 2018. Sejak itu, Janji Jiwa sudah berkembang pesat hingga menjual 5 juta minuman melalui 400 kedainya di seluruh penjuru Indonesia.

Apa rahasia suksesnya? Mereka ternyata memiliki komitmen untuk menggandeng para petani, partner, dan masyarakat. Janji Jiwa menggunakan konsep fresh-to-cup, yaitu membeli kopi langsung dari para petani di Sumatera yang kemudian biji kopinya langsung mereka proses dan sangrai sendiri. Seiring bertumbuhnya merek mereka, para petani juga ikut menuai manfaatnya karena sekarang Janji Jiwa memesan sekitar 30 ton biji kopi dari para petani ini tiap bulannya.

Partner, atau pembeli waralaba Janji Jiwa, ikut merasakan betapa kuatnya merek ini karena semakin hari semakin banyak yang tertarik untuk mengikuti program waralaba mereka. Minat ini tercermin pada jumlah gerai partner yang begitu banyak di seluruh Indonesia dan mencakup hampir 90%25 dari seluruh gerai Kopi Janji Jiwa. Dengan semakin berkembangnya jaringan Janji Jiwa serta meningkatnya minat masyarakat untuk memesan lewat delivery, Janji Jiwa menargetkan untuk membuka hingga 700 gerai dalam waktu dekat.

Menu Janji Jiwa terbilang sederhana namun lezat. Dua menu paling populernya adalah Es Kopi Susu dan Es Susu Coklat, yang merupakan hasil kolaborasi dengan para petani Indonesia. Racikan mereka memberikan rasa klasik teh hijau ataupun cokelat dari tanah Indonesia langsung. Menarik banget, kan? Yuk, langsung pesan kopinya lewat GrabFood.

The famous Korean corporation Lotte also has a fast food chain%3A Lotteria. Opened for the first time in Seoul in 1979, it finally reached Indonesia in 2011 at the heat of the appetite for Korean culture. Despite serving a fast food menu at an affordable price, this Korean chain does not take quality lightly. It holds the international certificate for Food Safety RVA HACCP that ensure that food is fresh, safe, and nutritious.

The popular Chicken Ganjeong is well worth a try. Served in a medium-sized cup, the fillets of chicken are mixed with chunks of sweet potato. The sauce, which contains brown sugar, gives a combination of spicy, sweet and savoury taste to tease your palate. For those with a small appetite, one serving is more than enough for a meal!. If you're into an East Meets West kind of meal, order the Bulgogi Burger. This delicious burger is accompanied with bulgogi sauce, a favourite not only in Indonesia but also in its birthplace of South Korea.

If you're looking for a snack try the Topokki in a Cup, Cupokki. The topokki has just the right level of chewiness and the sauce is not spicy, so it's ideal for all the family. Whenever you're in need of a quick fix of Korean cuisines, just order up a GrabFood delivery and enjoy this delicacy in the comfort of your own home.

Walaupun menyediakan makanan cepat saji yang murah tapi Lotteria nggak main-main dalam hal kualitas. Mereka memegang sertifikat Keamanan Makanan RVA HACCP yang memastikan makanan mereka nggak hanya segar dan bergizi tapi juga aman untuk dikonsumsi.

Salah satu yang populer di sini adalah Chicken Ganjeong, yaitu potongan ayam dengan saus cokelat yang memberikan rasa pedas, manis, dan gurih dalam satu gigitan. Disajikan dengan potongan-potongan ubi manis, satu porsi Chicken Ganjeong pasti bakal cukup banget untuk bikin kamu kenyang. Kalau kamu suka model makanan fusion, coba saja pesan Bulgogi Burger di sini. Sekilas terlihat seperti burger ala Barat tapi dagingnya yang disiapkan dengan saus bulgogi Korea yang memberikan nuansa ketimuran. Burger ini merupakan menu kesayangan banyak pelanggan Lotteria, baik di Indonesia maupun di negara asalnya. Selain itu, ada juga snack mengenyangkan berjudul Cupokki. Isinya adalah topokki (rice cake Korea) kenyal dengan saus yang nggak pedas, cocok untuk disantap bareng sekeluarga.

Kalau kamu mau hidangan cepat saji dengan citarasa Korea, sudah pasti jawabannya adalah Lotteria. Pesan saja lewat delivery GrabFood, dan pesananmu akan diantar langsung ke kenyamanan rumahmu.

id-en.body:
Ever wonder why this brand is called 'ngehe' (annoying)? It apparently stems from the owner's amusing life story.

Ali Dharmawan grew up with financial challenges throughout his life, and rose up to turn things around for his family. Being a really good businessman. Makaroni was his mother's favourite recipe to make during Idul Fitri and it became his favourite, too. Using these recipes, Ali then opened the first Makaroni Ngehe outlet in 2013 at Binus Anggrek University.

Offering budget-friendly snacks and a menu of childhood favourites such as mi lidi, Makaroni Ngehe was an immediate hit among college students. Aside from mi lidi, you can also order otak-otak, cimol, dried macaroni, and many other snacks that are loaded with umami flavours.

Today the company is franchised throughout Java. Now you can order these childhood snacks wherever you are in Java and Sumatera. Or to make things easier, simply choose GrabFood delivery!

On the official website, Ali jokingly states that these snacks can cure heartbreak, bad moods, sleepiness, boredom, and many others; and that can't be a bad thing!

Tahu nggak kenapa merek satu ini pakai kata ‘ngehe'?

Ternyata asal muasalnya dari latar belakang hidupnya sang pendiri, Ali Muharram, yang ‘ngehe' banget karena kondisi keuangannya sering jatuh-bangun dan banyak mengalami kesulitan. Karena itulah, Ali bertekad kuat untuk mengubah hidupnya melalui bisnis ini. Pilihan Ali jatuh pada makaroni yang merupakan makanan favorit keluarganya sejak dahulu kala.

Makaroni Ngehe menawarkan menu camilan murah seperti mie lidi, otak-otak, cimol, dan makaroni kering yang pastinya bikin kamu susah berhenti ngunyah. Semua snack ini asyik banget untuk dimakan sambil nonton maupun sambil menemani waktu kerja dan belajarmu. Gerai pertamanya dibuka pada tahun 2013 di Kampus Anggrek Universitas Binus, Jakarta, dan langsung hits di kalangan para mahasiswa. Siapa yang nggak tertarik, coba? Ali berseloroh bahwa camilannya “... ampuh menghilangkan bete, patah hati ditinggal kekasih, ngantuk di tempat kerja, suntuk karena macet, otak mumet karena belajar matematika dan juga untuk menghilangkan gugup saat PDKT.”

Jadi kalau lagi sedih atau mumet, langsung saja buka delivery makanan GrabFood dan pesan Makaroni Ngehe sekarang juga!

Another interesting option to order here is the 4-Flavour Pizza Martabak, perfect for sharing with friends – even if everyone likes a different flavour! All are served on the same pizza martabak, next to one another.

For chocolate or cheese lovers, Martabak Orient offers you plenty of options. A popular cheesy item is the Durian Keju flavour. For chocolate lovers, the classic chocolate cheese flavour balances the sweetness from the chocolate and the saltiness of the cheese.

And if you're into something savoury, don't miss out on the egg martabak, packed with minced meat. For extra zing, try dipping it into the vinegar sauce! Martabak Orient is renowned for its generous amount of toppings. So, if you're looking for a good afternoon or late night snack that will satisfy your cravings (whether savoury or sweet), check out this martabak outlet now.

Pada umumnya, martabak dilipat menjadi dua atau setengah lingkaran, tapi Sony tetap membuka martabak tersebut sehingga terlihat seperti lingkaran pizza, lalu topping-­­nya ia taburkan di atasnya. Jadilah gerai Martabak Pizza Orins pertama pada tahun 2011 sebagai pelopor martabak pizza di Jakarta.

Selain inovasi martabak pizza yang sekarang sudah menjadi tren kekinian di dunia martabak Jakarta, Sony juga memodernisasi rasa martabak dan menawarkan rasa-rasa berbeda. Di menunya, kamu bisa menemukan lebih dari 25 pilihan martabak manis, 13 jenis topping, 9 jenis martabak asin, dan 4 jenis rasa adonan (cokelat, pandan, red velvet, dan teh hijau). id-en.body:
Let's admit it, fast food is one of the best comfort foods out there. Order it for dine-in or delivery, a plate of crispy fried chicken with warm rice is the best dish in town! No wonder, a line at a fast-food outlet such as McDonald's is rarely short.

McDonald's opened its first store in the USA in 1955, then arrived in Indonesia in 1991 at Sarinah, Thamrin, Jakarta; claiming its spot as Indonesia's first fast-food restaurant. With over 29 years in Indonesia, McDonald's is a fast-food brand that is close to many Indonesian's hearts. Who doesn't feel warm inside when ordering a Happy Meal?

While the Big Mac is one of the most popular menu items in the brand's home-country, in Indonesia, McDonald's adapts its strategy to fit the Indonesian palate%3A where the firm favourite is PaNas%3A crispy chicken with rice. Still popular decades later; it's the one that melts every Indonesians heart. Unique seasonal items such as the spicy chicken with Thai sweet chili sauce.

As a commitment to sustainability throughout its value chain, McDonald's only sources high-quality beef from Australia, locally-sourced chicken, and an RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil) certified palm oil. On top of that, all of the ingredients used throughout the cooking process is certified HALAL.

id-en.page_title: McDonald's Food Delivery Menu & Promo | GrabFood ID

McDonald's membuka outlet pertamanya di Amerika Serikat pada tahun 1955 dan tiba di Indonesia pada tahun 1991 di Sarinah Thamrin, Jakarta. Sepanjang tiga dekade melayani Indonesia, McDonald's dikenal sebagai merek fast food yang bernuansa kekeluargaan. Coba, siapa yang nggak lumer hatinya melihat koleksi figurin lucu waktu memesan Happy Meal?

Meskipun Big Mac adalah menu paling populer di negara asalnya, Indonesia punya favoritnya sendiri di McDonald's, yaitu PaNas atau paket nasi hangat dengan ayam goreng krispi. PaNas digemari banyak orang selama bertahun-tahun karena rasanya yang cocok dengan lidah lokal dan harganya yang bersahabat. Kalau mau mencoba yang lain dari yang lain, coba deh menu unik atau musimannya McDonald's Indonesia, seperti ayam Gochujang atau ayam potong saus rica-rica. Dijamin akan memberikan kamu secercah kesegaran.

McDonald's yang sudah bersertifikat HALAL ini hanya membeli daging sapi berkualitas tinggi dari Australia, ayam dari peternak lokal, dan minyak goreng kelapa yang bersertifikat RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil). Jadi, walaupun judulnya makanan cepat saji, kamu nggak perlu khawatir dengan kualitas makanan di sini.

id-en.body:
Established by a company famous for its cheesy snacks, Richeese Factory offers a menu of savoury dishes served with its famous cheese sauce — as well as desserts. Serving Indonesians since 2011, its first outlet opened in the breezy city of Bandung. A decade later, it has expanded to many big cities throughout Indonesia with more than  160 outlets.

Knowing how much Indonesians love spicy food, the Richeese Factory started by selling spicy fried chicken (the “Fire” series) served with its signature cheese sauce. The cheese and chilli combo has since become a favourite among fried chicken lovers. When it comes to kick, you can choose from level 0 (Beginner level) to level 5 (Ultimate level). Some may get confused between the Fire Chicken and the Hot & Spicy (H&S) Chicken. Both are spicy, but the Fire series goes next level with BBQ and cheese sauces.

Meanwhile, those who don't eat spicy food can enjoy the Richicken menu. This is fried chicken with a thin layer of crispy chicken skin — famous for its umami factor. Order a side of BBQ sauce for a richer taste.

Got a craving for delicious fried chicken with a difference? GrabFood can do a delivery to you!

id-id.body:

Richeese Factory paham banget kalau rakyat Indonesia itu pecinta masakan pedas. Makanya menu yang ditonjolkan di sini adalah ayam goreng pedas Fire Chicken yang ditemani dengan saus keju leleh. Kombinasi asinnya keju dan pedasnya sambal pada ayam Fire Chicken-nya pasti langsung favorit di lidah kalangan pecinta ayam goreng pedas. Kalau kamu penasaran, langsung saja pesan lewat GrabFood dan pilih level pedasnya dari 0 (level pemula) hingga 5 (level Ultimate).

Selain Fire Chicken, ada pula Hot & Spicy (H&S) Chicken yang nggak kalah pedasnya dari Fire Chicken. Kalau Fire Chicken dimasak dengan bumbu BBQ dan diselingi dengan saus keju, H&S Chicken adalah ayam goreng pedas gurih. Bagi yang nggak tahan pedas, boleh cobain menu Richicken-nya, yaitu ayam goreng berbalut kulit krispi yang penuh dengan luapan rasa gurih tanpa rasa pedas. Untuk kenikmatan yang lebih maksimal, pesan tambah saus BBQ atau saus kejunya aja waktu memesan H&S Chicken maupun Richicken. Dijamin makanmu bakal makin lahap!

Membuka gerai pertamanya di Bandung pada tahun 2011, hampir sepuluh tahun kemudian, Richeese Factory sudah berkembang ke seluruh kota besar di Indonesia dengan lebih dari 160 gerai. Dengan kata lain, kapanpun kamu pingin makan ayam goreng, tinggal pesan delivery saja lewat GrabFood.

If you live in Central Java, you are likely to have  heard of Rocket Chicken. The founder Nurul Atik has an interesting background. His first job was cleaning for a well-known fried chicken chain and with one promotion after another was finally appointed as the area manager. With all his experience, he decided to open his own business “Rocket Chicken” in Semarang in 2010. In just one year, he successfully expanded the brand into 83 partnerships. Now, this Central Java brand continues to expand and has opened in other parts of Java, Sumatera, and Kalimantan with a total of 650 outlets to date.

Carrying the tagline “Great Price, Great Taste”, the Rocket Chicken menu serves not only battered fried chicken, but also smashed chicken, and chicken steak. The battered part of the fried chicken is not too thick and not too crispy, with the seasoning richly working its way right through meat. The smashed chicken uses strong sambal bawang with a rich onion-garlic aroma, making it an appetising option. Meanwhile, the chicken steak uses a traditional brown sauce poured over battered smashed chicken. All are tasty, and popular with plenty to choose from, whatever the occasion. Order online through GrabFood for delivery.

id-id.body:
Yang tinggal di Jawa Tengah pasti pernah dengar nama Rocket Chicken. Ternyata ada cerita menarik di balik berdirinya merek ini, lho. Pendirinya, Nurul Atik, dulunya bekerja di sebuah waralaba ayam goreng terkenal sebagai tukang bersih-bersih. Karena etos kerjanya yang baik, ia terus-menerus dipromosikan hingga akhirnya berhasil diangkat sebagai Manajer Wilayah yang mencakup beberapa kota besar di Jawa Tengah. Seluruh pengalamannya yang mencakup bidang operasional, dapur, hingga manajemen tersebut membuat Nurul yakin untuk membuka bisnisnya sendiri. Gerai Rocket Chicken pertama akhirnya dibuka di Semarang pada tahun 2010. Selang setahun berdiri, Rocket Chicken sudah langsung berkembang ke 83 kemitraan dan sampai sekarang masih terus melebarkan sayapnya sampai ke seluruh Jawa, Sumatera, dan Kalimantan dengan total 650 gerai.

Dengan moto “Pas Harganya, Istimewa Rasanya”, menu Rocket Chicken nggak hanya menawarkan ayam goreng tepung tapi juga ayam geprek dan bistik ayam (Chicken Steak). Bagian tepung ayam gorengnya tergolong unik karena nggak terlalu tebal dan nggak terlalu garing. Bumbunya sendiri meresap sampai ke dalam dagingnya. Ayam gepreknya sendiri ditemani sambal bawang yang pedes banget, sedangkan bistik ayamnya memakai saus cokelat tradisional yang dituang ke atas daging besar ayam goreng tepung.

Kalau lagi mau makan yang ringkas tapi enak dan disukai oleh seluruh keluarga, pesan saja Rocket Chicken lewat GrabFood. Delivery ke rumah pasti menambah kelezatan ayam Rocket Chicken.

id-en.body:
Founded in 2009, SaladStop! modernises salads. With the motto “Eat Wide Awake”, it promotes a healthier lifestyle by emphasising the importance of knowing what we eat. Partnering with verified local producers to ensure good quality control, SaladStop! uses ingredients that take less than 72 hours to travel from earth to bowl.

Choose from the menu or Create Your Own (CYO) salad from the extensive range of 60 toppings and 20 homemade dressings. Order CYO via GrabFood as a salad or wrap%3A just choose your base, your greens, toppings and a dressing, or opt for a warm quinoa bowl instead.  

All the signature items are firm favourites, but one of the most popular in Indonesia is the Hail Caesar, a modern spin on the classic Caesar salad. For more contemporary options, try the Jai Ho! with tandoori chicken, or the Go Geisha with Japanese favourites edamame and soba noodles. For lovers of spice, the Korean-style Bold Bulgogi hits the spot. Who says healthy has to be boring?

Avoid the long queues; order via GrabFood and invigorate your taste buds while promotiwellbeing!

id-id.body:
Kalau mau lihat salad keren dan kekinian, lihat saja menunya SaladStop! Kamu bisa pilih cepat dari menu siap SaladStop! atau bikin saladmu sendiri alias Create Your Own (CYO). Menu Signature SaladStop! semuanya enak-enak walaupun yang paling populer di Indonesia adalah Hail Caesar, kreasi unik caesar salad ala SaladStop! yang mudah diterima semua lidah. Kalau mau yang seru, coba deh pesan Jai Ho! yang berisi ayam tandoori khas India, Go Geisha yang pakai edamame dan soba Jepang, atau Bold Bulgogi yang khas Korea. Semuanya enak, sehat, dan pastinya jauh dari kata ‘membosankan'!

Kamu juga bisa bikin salad kreasimu sendiri yang juga bisa dibungkus rapi ala kebab (Wrap). Tinggal pilih mau bahan dasar (base) apa, lalu lanjut pilih sayurannya, topping yang tersedia 60 jenis, dan salah satu sausnya dari 20 jenis saus yang tersedia. Kalau datang langsung ke gerai SaladStop!, CYO bisa bikin bingung karena opsinya banyak banget. Makanya mending pesan CYO lewat GrabFood saja, karena kamu tinggal centang semua pilihan yang kamu mau. Lebih ringkas dan nggak pake bingung.

Didirikan pada tahun 2009, SaladStop! memang mau mengajak kita untuk hidup sehat, salah satunya dengan mengetahui apa yang masuk ke tubuh kita. SaladStop! memastikan semua bahan makanannya berkualitas dan berusia kurang dari 72 jam dari panennya. Untuk memastikan standar kualitas ini, SaladStop! mengambil bahan makanannya dari produsen-produsen lokal.

Seru, kan? Makan sehat, segar, dan enak seperti ini cuma ada di SaladStop! Delivery sekarang, yuk, lewat GrabFood.

Shihlin dulunya hanya kedai sederhana di pasar malam di Taiwan loh. Tapi saking enaknya, banyak orang yang rela antri buat jajanan pasar ini. Sekarang Shihlin tersedia di beberapa negara di Asia Tenggara.

id-en.body:
Shihlin's Taiwan Street Snacks offers a different kind of fried chicken. Boneless, cut as fillet, and deep fried until it's golden, it's mouthwateringly crispy and meaty. Eaten as a snack without a hint of rice, it is truly the icon of Taiwanese street food.

The name Shihlin is derived from the biggest and most famous night market in Taiwan. Here, you can sample Taiwan's endless options of local delicacies from more than 500 stalls. Shihlin's Taiwan Street Snacks is a nod to this famous destination. And it's proudly showcasing Taiwanese food to the world.

With outlets around the world, Shihlin is the leading Taiwanese street snack outlet in the world, and Indonesia is one of its biggest fans! Launched in Indonesia in 2007, there are now around 130 outlets in the country.

Even though its XXL Crispy Chicken remains a firm favourite, you can order other street snacks from the menu. Crispy salt pepper mushroom, sweet plum potato fries and crispy floss egg crepes are a nice overview of Taiwan's street food culture. Or if you want a twist on the XXL Crispy Chicken, simply order the BBQ or other seasonings.

Shihlin is famous for food that's great to-go, and delivery-friendly. Head to the counter, order, pay, then pick up your food already wrapped inside a thin paper fold, with sticks to eat it with, just like in Taiwan. Or even better, sit back, relax, order, and wait for it to be delivered to you!

Snack satu ini memang ikonnya street food Taiwan. Nama Shihlin diambil dari nama pasar malam paling terkenal di Taiwan. Di pasar ini, kamu bisa mencicipi berbagai masakan lokal Taiwan dari ratusan gerai yang buka sampai tengah malam. Shihlin's Taiwan Street Snacks kurang lebih adalah versi mini pasar kuliner tersebut.

Menu andalan Shihlin adalah XXL Crispy Chicken yang hadir dalam rasa berbeda-beda, salah satunya BBQ. Selain itu, Shihlin juga menawarkan menu lain yang nggak kalah enaknya seperti Crispy Salt Pepper Mushroom, Sweet Plum Potato Fries, dan Crispy Floss Egg Crepes. Semua citarasa ini bakal memberi kamu gambaran tentang serunya pasar jajanan Shihlin aslinya.

Berdiri di Indonesia sejak tahun 2007, Shihlin sekarang bisa dijumpai di lebih dari 130 gerai di penjuru negeri, memudahkan kamu yang mau memesan delivery camilan a la Taiwan ini dari tempat tinggalmu. Tinggal buka GrabFood dan, woosh, snack Taiwan ini pun sampai di hadapanmu.

Started in 1991, Solaria was a small restaurant with just four employees. Aliuyanto, the owner, decided to quit his office job to open his own business. Over the years, Solaria has gained its popularity. And now, decades later, it shows no signs of slowing down. It now counts two hundred restaurants over 31 provinces and 55 cities.

As for the menu, Solaria injects some international influence over its dishes. A range of kwetiau, from chicken to seafood, is available for order. id-en.body:
This famous coffee chain opened its first shop in 1971 in Seattle's Pike Place Market, selling roasted beans only before adding an espresso-based menu to introduce a coffeehouse culture to locals. The menu of innovative flavoured coffees and blended drinks we now know and love evolved over the years, alongside the expansion of the Starbucks brand across the world.

Ever since its early days, Starbucks' mission was to serve great coffee from freshly roasted whole beans — which at that time, was uncommon. The name Starbucks itself was inspired by a character in the sea-faring novel Moby Dick, and its iconic mermaid logo was a nod to ships that travelled the world delivering coffee beans.

Starbucks opened its first store in Indonesia in Plaza Indonesia, Jakarta, in 2002 and hasn't looked back. With a menu that has expanded well beyond coffee drinks, you can now order premium tea and one of its best-selling drinks, the Frappucinno, which to some teenagers, is the beginning of an exciting coffee journey! And, of course, there's a great menu of sandwiches, paninis, salads and pastries to turn your favourite drink order into a meal.

Around the world, you can find close to 30,000 outlets across 78 countries. In Indonesia alone, there are more than 320 outlets in 22 cities. And your favourite drinks and treats from Starbucks are available to order from GrabFood for delivery right now!

Salah satu minuman kopi populernya adalah Frappuccino, yakni, minuman dingin berbahan kopi campuran yang seringkali mengawali perjalanan cinta panjang seseorang dengan kopi. Selain minuman, Starbucks juga menyediakan menu makanan seperti sandwich, panini, salad, dan pastry yang cocok disantap bersama dengan minumanmu.

id-en.body:
Enjoy the aroma of freshly brewed tea, a refreshingly chilled drink, or the soothing effect of a warm beverage from KOI The. The bubble tea shop KOI was founded in 2006 in Taiwan with a focus on quality and founder Khloe Ma changed the brand to KOI The in 2015 to reflect her business' emphasis on tea. KOI The carefully picks the raw ingredients, supervises the brewing process, and ensures precision and consistency in all of its servings. The fragrant tea aroma is extracted by brewing tea leaves in traditional metal kettles and mixed with water at the perfect ratio under carefully controlled temperatures.

Since its launch in Indonesia in 2013, KOI has since been known for its golden bubble. Unlike other boba that are usually black, KOI The's bubble is, well, golden. These are made from natural ingredients and cooked in different temperatures to give them the signature bounciness and golden sheen. If you've never tried KOI The before, the Golden Bubble Milk Tea is a good item to start with. The Macchiato series is also popular the menu. Enjoy sipping the foamy milk layer at the top part of your cup before taking delight in the aromatic drink. There are several options, but the Matcha and Ovaltine Macchiatos come highly recommended.

If you're craving a good tea to accompany your work or to enjoy on a slow afternoon on a weekend, order a delivery via GrabFood now.

id-id.body:
Nikmati aroma teh alami, segarnya minuman dingin, atau teh hangat dari KOI The. Toko bubble tea KOI ini dibuka pertama kali di Taiwan pada tahun 2006. Pemiliknya, Khloe Ma, kemudian mengubah mereknya menjadi KOI The pada tahun 2015 untuk menekankan fokus bisnisnya pada minuman teh. 

Kualitas minuman KOI The memang jempolan. Mereka memilih bahan bakunya dan mengawasi tahap penyeduhannya dengan seksama, serta memastikan bahwa setiap sajiannya dibuat dengan tepat dan konsisten sesuai prosedur mereka. Harumnya teh KOI The didapat dari ekstrak daun teh yang memakai rasio air dan suhu tertentu, di dalam ketel besi.

Sejak masuk Indonesia pada tahun 2013, KOI dikenal dengan boba emasnya yang unik. Boba dari bahan alami ini dimasak pada suhu yang berbeda-beda untuk menghasilkan kekenyalan yang khas dan menghasilkan warna keemasan. Boba ini bisa kamu coba dengan memesan Golden Bubble Milk Tea-nya yang populer. Selain itu, menu Macchiato-nya juga favorit. Macchiato adalah seduhan teh berlapiskan busa susu pada bagian atasnya. Jadi, cara minumnya adalah dengan menyeruput gelasnya untuk agar bisa merasakan rasa busa susu yang berpadu apik dengan tehnya yang beraroma segar. Belum pernah pesan Macchiato di sini? Cobain deh Matcha atau Ovaltine Macchiato-nya.

Kalau kamu mau ditemani secangkir teh berkualitas tinggi sambil kerja, atau menikmati senja akhir minggu dengan aroma teh yang syahdu, langsung saja pesan delivery KOI The lewat GrabFood. Nggak perlu lagi deh repot-repot ngantri di gerainya langsung.

The branch in Tanjung Duren, West Jakarta mentioned that this Nasi Goreng Seafood is ordered every single day; and loved by all.

If you're not sure where to start, consider any (or all) of these popular items%3A Gurame Asam Manis (Sweet and Sour Carp), Sapo Tahu Ayam (Chicken and Tofu in Claypot), Ayam Goreng, and Cap Cay Goreng.

Dengan prinsipnya ini, nggak heran Waroenk Kito yang didirikan pada tahun 2001 di Jakarta ini sudah menyebar ke seluruh Jakarta hingga luar Jakarta.

Kalau belum biasa dengan menu Waroenk Kito, mungkin kamu bingung memilih makanannya karena pilihannya banyak banget dan semuanya terlihat enak banget. Rekomendasi menu perdana buat kamu yang sendirian adalah Nasi Goreng Kejunya. Nasi goreng ini diselimuti dengan telur dadar tipis dan ditaburi keju parut pada bagian atasnya. Selain itu, Nasi Goreng Seafood-nya juga populer. Saking populernya, cabangnya di Tanjung Duren mengatakan bahwa menu satu ini pasti selalu ada yang pesan setiap harinya.

Kalau kamu memesan untuk keluarga di rumah, dibikin seru saja. Setiap anggota keluarga harus memilih satu makanan dari menunya yang heboh itu. Kalau ada yang bingung, bisa mulai dari hidangan favorit seperti Gurame Asam Manis, Sapo Tahu Ayam, Ayam Goreng, dan Cap Cay (goreng atau kuah). Semua makanannya terasa homey jadi cocok banget untuk dipesan pas lagi malas memasak. Tinggal pesan delivery saja via GrabFood untuk menikmati masakan rumahan Waroenk Kito di rumah.

id-en.body:
Chicken wings and fries are the epitome of good times. But Wingstop insists that it is on another level with ten different flavours on the menu, all organised based on their heat level, promising a wild, and flavourful ride.

Originating as a small buffalo-style chicken wing house in Texas in 1994, Wingstop quickly gained momentum. In 1997,  the company began offering franchises for passionate business owners, and the rest is history. Now, Wingstop has 1,250 restaurants in US alone, and has expanded to Mexico, Colombia, Panama, Singapore, and Indonesia.

In Indonesia, Wingstop believes that it is the only restaurant in the country that offers such an extensive menu of chicken wings. Its ambitious effort to open 100 outlets within seven years may soon become a reality as Indonesia is its fastest-growing market. For Indonesian diners, Wingstop has adapted to the local palate by offering rice and chicken wings packages—a winning combo.

At Wingstop all orders are freshly prepared. Craving the ultimate stay at home comfort food? Simply order on GrabFood and get them delivered to wherever you are!

id-id.body:
Sayap ayam atau chicken wings yang ditemani kentang goreng memang pas banget untuk menemani momen-momen seru waktu lagi ngumpul rame-rame atau nonton pertandingan di TV. Dan sayap ayam Wingstop levelnya beda banget karena tersedia dalam 10 pilihan rasa yang ditata menurut level pedasnya. Dan yang unik dari setiap rasa ini nggak cuma level pedasnya, tapi juga citarasa bumbunya. Tiga bumbu terfavoritnya adalah Garlic Parmesan (campuran bawang dan keju), Louisiana Rub (bumbu Cajun asin, manis, pedas), dan Hickory Smoked Barbeque (rasa manis ala BBQ). Bagi yang suka pedas, coba saja sayap ayam bumbu Mango Habanero yang mencampur rasa manis mangga dengan pedasnya cabe habanero, sayap ayam Red Hot Cajun yang pedasnya bercampur tomat segar dan rempah Cajun, serta dua bumbu jawara pedas, Atomic Blast dan Ssamjang Attack yang harus kamu coba kalau kamu demen pedas.

Berawal dari restoran mungil di Texas pada tahun 1994, Wingstop langsung digemari banyak orang. Makanya mereka menawarkan sistem waralaba pada tahun 1997 supaya lebih banyak orang yang bisa menikmati sayap ayam serunya. Sekarang, Wingstop punya 1.250 gerai di Amerika Serikat, belum termasuk jumlah outletnya di Indonesia, Singapura, Meksiko, Kolombia, dan Panama.

Psst, Indonesia ternyata adalah pasar Wingstop yang paling berkembang pesat, lho. Nggak mengherankan memang, karena hanya Wingstop yang menawarkan bumbu sayap ayam yang sedemikian beragamnya di Indonesia. Apalagi Wingstop juga menawarkan menu kesukaan orang Indonesia%3A nasi ayam goreng.

Kalau kamu mau comfort food untuk dinikmati di rumah, pesan Wingstop untuk delivery saja. GrabFood selalu siap mengantarkan kapan saja!

id-en.body:
Did you know that we have a local brand for boba? The local tea scene is now getting a lot more exciting with local startups contributing their own take on this Taiwanese Milk Tea. Order it to go or delivery, you're in for a treat!

The founders opened Xi Bo Ba in September 2019 under the Kulo Group, which also heads Kedai Kopi Kulo. Xi Bo Ba's mission is to sell the best tasting drinks at the most affordable prices.

In just a single day after opening, Xi Bo Ba sold 250 franchises. Quenching the thirst for boba milk tea among Indonesians throughout the nation, Xi Bo Ba is said to be the fastest growing franchise for milk tea, selling around 900 cups per day per outlet. 

Try the signature drink%3A the Fresh Milk Boba with super soft and juicy boba. The Xi Bo Ba menu is split into three%3A The Bobas (as its name suggests, for boba fans!), Sakura Macchiato (a combination of fruity drinks with silky, foamy milk), and Tea Macchiato. Amongst these three categories, Brown Sugar Boba is the ultimate favourite.

Satisfy your cravings for this drink, by ordering for delivery on the GrabFood app!
